en: As you're working on your project, you find yourself criticizing every move you make. You're not working hard enough - that looks terrible - no one would want to buy this!
You realize your thoughts are somewhat harsh, but don't know how to deal with them. Are they helping you do good work, or are they hurting your productivity?
You decide they're helping. It's better to chase perfection and fail than to accept mediocrity.
All your thoughts are doing is making it harder for you to work. You take a break to focus on the things you're doing well, then get back to it with higher spirits.
